sections.title: PMID Settings
text: BASE_PMID_URL: is a variable which set the link that is used to add to each PubMedID the pubmed article associated with it.

sections.title: Paths Settings
text: DOCS_PATH: is a variable which set the path where the json documentation files are stored. DATASET_LOCATION: is a variable which set the path to the folder where the datasets are located. GENE_TABLE_NAME: is a variable which set the name of the GeneTable file. DISEASE_TABLE_NAME: is a variable which set the name of the GeneTable file.

sections.title: Cache Settings
text: Here are settings used by flask-caching to store the tables and download them later.
CACHE_CONFIG: is a dictionary containing some options for the cache.

The cache stores the data as 'Key: Value' pairs. This is the name of the Key which will contain the table (as dics) computed when an operation on the datasets is called, to be later retrieved and downloaded.
TABLE_CACHE_NAME: is a variable which set the name of the key to which the last table computed will be saved in the cache.
